name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Dongping County, Tai'an, Shandong. This morning, a customized bus picking up students at the gate of Foshan Middle School rushed into a crowd of students going to school on the roadside, causing more than a dozen students to be killed or injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The scene was in a mess, with many people lying on the ground. The driver had been detained. Local authorities were urgently organizing the injured to be sent to the hospital for treatment. Insiders said: The ambulance went back and forth dozens of times, and the trees in front of the school were broken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Chinese official media reports, the accident caused 11 deaths and the cause of the accident is under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The bus involved was towed away. Nearby merchants: When the incident happened, many students and parents were queuing to enter the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 2nd local time, Putin arrived in Mongolia for an official visit. This was his first visit to a signatory to the Rome Convention since the International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant against him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Bayuquan, Liaoning, citizens reported that many staff members of the local Market Supervision and Administration Bureau took a collective nap during working hours.
September 2, Anhui. Villagers said: I went to the Yanglou Village Committee of Gujing Town to do business. It was almost three o'clock in the afternoon, and there were no staff in the hall.
September 1, Jiangxi. Citizens said that at nine o'clock in the morning, there were no staff members in the social security department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, kindergartens in many places held parent pledges at enrollment ceremonies, stating that “parents will never ask teachers to feed them water in the group, will never give teachers the cold shoulder, and will not be bear parents,” which sparked controversy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2, Lianyungang, Jiangsu. A man said that his father had passed away, but the local authorities refused to issue a death certificate and required him to buy a cemetery first. When he paid 3,800 yuan to buy the cemetery, the certificate he received was a receipt instead of a formal invoice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Beijing. The China-Africa Cooperation Forum Summit will be held on the 4th. A resident said that the local government requires people to close windows in a certain direction and draw curtains. In addition, many netizens said that the bus from Yanjiao to Beijing needs to check ID cards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, the China-Africa Cooperation Forum Summit is about to be held, but major official media have started to publish selected comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, the Changchun police issued a police report stating that a 45-year-old man threatened the crowd with a knife. The police fought with him. During the fight, one police officer was stabbed by the suspect and seriously injured. His gun was taken away and another police officer was injured. After the reinforcements arrived, the suspect opened fire and resisted stubbornly, injuring a police officer. The suspect, Li Mouye, was shot dead on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, economics doctor Meng Xiaosu said: If property tax is levied starting from small-property houses, 2 trillion yuan can be collected each year, which triggered a boycott from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 3, Gao Qiang, one of the Gao brothers, revealed to a friend that his brother Gao Qi's wife had been placed under border control. 
She had planned to fly back to New York with her children today, but when she went through customs at Beijing Airport, the customs refused to let her go on the grounds that she was endangering national security.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, a private anti-trafficking volunteer reported that someone in Baoshan, Yunnan, was introducing underage surrogacy, and was maliciously complained about after the report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2 (Released) Shanxi Tiechu Energy Co., Ltd. issued a notice: Due to the large gap between employees' actual salary and expectations, resulting in low employee enthusiasm and too many complaints, the company decided to terminate the labor contracts of all employees and re-recruit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2, Yuzhou, Henan. A woman reported in her real name that she was retaliated by the school for reporting that Xiadu School illegally charged after-school extension fees and enrolled students across districts. She was removed from her job as a class teacher and her child was not allowed to go to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Qingdao Public Security reported the investigation of the case of "Wang driving against traffic and insulting and beating others", which mentioned that "Wang currently has no fixed job" and "this case does not meet the requirements of provoking disturbances"
See the picture for details

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of September 3, the bridge guards at the Xinjiekou to Xizhimen section in Beijing were replaced by armed police and two police officers equipped with fire extinguishers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, the notice on the plan to formulate the mandatory national standard "Hygiene Requirements for Bulk Transportation of Edible Vegetable Oils" was issued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Zhihu user asked, "The UK is already a second-rate country, why is it still so influential?" The user replied, "You've only been eating for a few years and you're already saying that others are old and powerful countries. The UK's animal protection law is more effective than Tokyo's labor law."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Qingdao Public Security Bureau issued the notice, many users with IP addresses from Shandong Province posted messages in the comment section, saying "Trust the police, don't believe in rumors, and don't spread them."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just one day before the car accident at Foshan Middle School in Dongping County, Tai'an Daily reported: With the arrival of the new semester, Dongping Public Security has scientifically deployed police forces, standing at the "first post" of protecting schools and making every effort to maintain campus safety and good public security and traffic order around the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, according to media reports, in the wolfberry producing area of Jingyuan, Gansu, many merchants use the method of "sulfur fumigation" to keep wolfberries fresh and not easy to spoil. In order to save costs, some merchants choose to fumigate wolfberries with industrial sulfur, but industrial sulfur cannot be used in food processing. It is toxic and can easily cause damage such as renal insufficiency and failure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Jingdezhen, Jiangxi. Urban management officers confiscated a basket of eggs from a vendor, but the vendor held on to the basket tightly, with a slogan on the back that read "Create a national civilized city, and work together to build a poetic and picturesque Fuliang."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, Chen Huaping, vice chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, said that he would correct the bad habits of materialism, extravagance, quick success, excessive speculation and showing off wealth in the securities, funds and futures industries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2, Guangzhou, Guangdong. Urban management officers confiscated a small toy from a mobile vendor. The vendor held the toy tightly and yelled, "You can't enforce the law barbarically, you are Chinese!" Seeing this, the person filming nearby pleaded for the vendor, "Master, please let him go. It's not easy for him to run a small business."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The September 3 editions of People’s Daily, Liberation Army Daily, Guangming Daily, and Economic Daily used exactly the same layout.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, a netizen posted a video saying that "Chinese people are the most excited when it comes to war." Many netizens left comments saying that they like war, "I dream of the day when nuclear bombs are flying all over the sky," and "I am a warmonger."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1 (Release) Shanghai. An old man who was addicted to the stock market invested 700,000 yuan and lost only 30,000 or 40,000 yuan, but he was still full of confidence. He said, "The third quarter will be a positive line! Thirty years of newspapers are not in vain, and thirty years of homework are not in vain."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, all topics related to "School bus hits students in Dongping County, Tai'an, Shandong, killing eleven people" on Weibo have been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Tongji University stopped the recruitment of new members for student clubs this year. Despite the efforts of student groups, the university still banned the recruitment of new members. It only allowed each student club to perform in batches on a small scale, and the words "recruitment" could not appear clearly during the process.
The specific reason is not clear at present.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Tong Runzhong refused to work overtime and was fired, and won the lawsuit against the company, which attracted attention, some netizens recently called on the proletariat of the world to unite and develop our own business on social platforms. A single spark can start a prairie fire. In response, netizens replied, "How to join the organization?" "Do you want to start a business?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing’s primary and secondary schools received an urgent notice from the Education Commission that they must leave school before 3:30 p.m. on September 4.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2, Sichuan. A netizen posted a video saying: In the canteen of a government unit, employees only need to spend 1 yuan for breakfast and can eat as many buns as they want, which aroused the anger of netizens in the comment area.
